body.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo With Backlit,2.4G Full Size Ergonomic Keyboard with Light Up Letters,Rechargeable and Slim,3-DPI Adjustable Mouse For Windows/MAC PC,Laptop,Chromebook,Surface,Macbook
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: 【Colorful Rainbow& RGB Backlight, Light your Working Moments】The keyboard has a rainbow color backlight and 4 adjustable brightness(off-30%-60%-100%). The mouse has 22 switchable RGB lighting effects（7 Solid Color Effects/7 Colorful Light Effects/7 Breathing Light Effects/Light Off ）. Light-up keycaps and letters help you to use it easier in low light.(𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞: 𝐊𝐞𝐲𝐛𝐨𝐚𝐫𝐝 𝐎𝐧𝐥𝐲 𝐫𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐛𝐨𝐰 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐥𝐢t 𝐚𝐯𝐚𝐢𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞, 𝐜𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐭 𝐛𝐞 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐥𝐞-𝐜olor）

【Quiet and Soft Clicks，Less Disturbs】Enjoy silent and comfortable Typing. Wireless computer keyboard with soft membrane keys for quiet and smooth typing. Mouse clicks are almost silent. The keyboard features low-profile keys that offer smooth, responsive laptop-style typing with 95% less noise. You don't worry about disturbing others.

【Smart Power-Saving Management, Fast Rechargeable】The rechargeable keyboard mouse combo is equipped with a type-c charging cable, standby for months on one charge. Has a friendly power-saving feature that automatically turns off the backlight after 90 seconds of non-use, with a separate power switch and backlit switch to save power.

【2.4Ghz Plug and Play, Lag Free Wireless Connection】Cut the cord and enjoy the freedom. 2.4GHz wireless technology provides automatic frequency recognition and stable signal, plug and play, connection range up to 33ft without any delays. 【Note】keyboard and mouse share a receiver.

【Ergonomic Design for Great Comfort ,Increase Productivity】Your work days become more comfortable and efficient when you use the EarlyLit wireless keyboard mouse combo. Our backlit wireless keyboard is built with 8°tilt legs, and the Ergonomic shaped mouse fit comfortably in either hand and thumb. Both design will encourage better typing posture and position to reduced strain and fatigue and to keeping you effective from the first hour to the last

【Silent Optical Mouse , 3-level DPI Adjustable 】This computer mouse is exquisite and compact, and provides whisper silent click, no need to worry about disturbing others to rest while in use. This DPI adjustable mouse provides 3 levels of DPI (800/1200/1600) to meet your different needs in terms of sensitivity. This optical mouse can also smooth movement even on smooth surfaces. In addition, this wireless mouse is symmetry design, both hands are available, suitable for all people.

【Compact Full-size 104-Keys, 12 Independent Shortcut Keys】With Standard US QWERTY layout and 12 independent shortcut keys, EarlyLit wireless keyboard makes working more efficient ,and each key on the number pad is well-spaced, greatly avoiding pressing the wrong key. The foldable stand behind the keyboard provides a comfortable typing angle for you, so you can enjoy comfortable typing for hours.

【Two-System Layout, Broad Compatibility for Most Devices】Switching between Mac and Windows layouts of the dual-system light up keyboard is as easy as a single touch. Compatible with Windows, Mac, Linux, Chrome OS. Works well with laptops, Macbooks, desktops, Chromebooks, pc, computers, surface, and tv.

【Exclusive Lifetime Warranty Service】 EarlyLit has always been committed to serving every customer well. No matter what problem you encounter, please feel free to contact us to find a satisfactory solution. We provide 24 month warranty and lifetime support as long as it is a product purchased from our store. Contact Detail: Click the store name behind "sold by" and click the "Ask a question" button to open the contact channel.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Rainbow Keyboard(1000mah)& RGB Mouse(500mah);Smart Power-Saving (2-Level Auto-Sleep Modes); Power Switches, WIN/MAC Daul Layout；33Feet Stable 2.4Ghz；Quiet Clicks;Independent Multi-Media Keys See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EarlyLit Slim and Colorful backlit Keyboard and Mouse Combo，Your finger Enjoys the Fast and Comfortable Clicks Get EarlyLit Wireless Colorful Rainbow Backlit Keyboard and Mouse Combo, Enjoy Ergonomic/Comfortable Keyboard and Slim/Portable Mouse Easily. 1. Ergonomic & Comfortable Typing Experience---Smooth and Almost Silent Computer Keyboard The bottom of the keyboard is equipped with foldable feet, allowing you to adjust the most comfortable typing angle.With the soft key stroke, the keyboard offers smoother touch. Besides, you will feel the keyboard more responsive that’s easy on your fingers and has no input errors. 2. Independent Hotkeys and 12 Combined Multimedia Fn-Keys & Numeric Pad On the Compact Keyboard With the Independent hotkeys and combined multimedia Fn-keys, you can always enjoy music, watch movies, browse websites, scan emails, etc. in a convenient way.With the independent numeric pad, you can quickly enter your passwords or deal with numerical calculation working. 3. Slim & Portable Design-- Wireless Optical Mouse with 3 Adjustable DPI(800-1200-1600) Wireless mouse adopts slim and symmetrical design, suitable for right or left hand. Moreover, the thinness makes the mouse easier for picking and moving, especially for kids.If you often need to travel or work away from home, this portable mouse is a good choice for you. Easily fits into a backpack and take around. 4. Instructions to Get Start With The Wonderful Keyboard and Mouse Set Take out the keyboard and mouse from the box, and take out the receiver from the mouse battery compartment;Make sure that the keyboard and mouse are both fully charged first;Insert the receiver into the USB port of the computer;Wait for the computer to automatically install the driver and start using it.

Personalize Keyboard and Mouse Backlighting ，Enjoy Hours of Cool Experiences The Colorful Rainbow Backlit Keyboard Provides 4 Brightness(100%/60% /30% and LED OFF Mode ), and Mouse Provides 22 RGB Light to DIY ! >> Adjust the Rainbow Backlit Keyboard's Brightness by Fn+End It is perfect in the dark, with each key glowing intensely so you can see them clearly. You can also notice the backlighting during the day: the keyboard will shine on your desktop. Both sober and elegant, the wireless keyboard backlighting can be switched off if you prefer.You will also be able to adjust its brightness. The keyboard will autoly turn off the backlighting after 90 seconds of idle time in order to extend its battery life. >> Adjust the RGB Backlit Mouse's Modes by LED Switch The mouse has 22 switchable lighting effects（7 Solid Color Effects/7 Colorful Light Effects/7 Breathing Light Effects/Light Off ). It can be controlled by the independent led switch on the bottom of the mouse.
Noiseless working，Not Disturbing others，Slim Chiclet Keystroke Provides Quiet Working Experiences

Smart Power Saving Management，Fast Rechargeable with USB C Cable Independent Power Switches/Auto-Backilit-Off/Auto-Sleep After 10Mins, Extends The Battery Life As Long As Possible,Which Reduce Charging Times >> For The Rainbow Backlit Wireless Slim & Compact Keyboard The keyboard will autoly turn off the backlighting after 90 seconds of idle time, Auto-sleep After 10mins Leaving, in order to extend its battery life.The wireless rechargeable keyboard could consistenly work for at least 25Hours With Fully 100% LEDs Brightness ON ，and work for 200Hours Without Light.It may takes about 4hours to recharge the high- quality 1000mah battery of the quiet and smooth keyboard. >> For The RGB Backlit Wireless Quiet & Ergonomic Mouse The mouse will Auto-sleep After 10mins Leaving, in order to extend its battery life.The wireless rechargeable mouse could consistenly work for at least 25Hours With RGB LEDs ON ，and work for 100Hours Without Light.It may takes about 2hours to recharge the high- quality 500mah battery of the mouse,which is for both left and right hands. >> Smart Power Saving Wireless Keyboard and Mouse, Auto-enter Power Saving Mode When You Stop Using It The wireless keyboard mouse both come with independent power switches, so you can turn them off when you will leave working for a long time to save batteries.This set is also designed with smart power saving function, they will auto-enter power saving mode when you stop using it for more than 10 Minutes. So, you could never worry about wasting battery when you forget to turn off the switch.Press any key or button can make the wireless keyboard mouse re-activity from power-saving mode.
Slim and Ergonomic Comfortable Mouse with 3-Level Adjustable DPI and 4 Buttons ,Independent Power Switch and RGB LED Switch, Enhance Your Working Moments

WIN/MAC Dual System Layouts,Strong Compatibility for MAC OS Windows Chrome OS Linux etc., Powerful Functions for All Devices Advanced and Stable 2.4Ghz Technology, Multi OS Supported For Windows/MAC OS,Make Sure The Wireless Mouse Keyboard Suites Every Situation You Meet. >> Powerful Compatibility This 2.4 GHz wireless mouse and keyboard Combo has built-in adaptive frequency technology, Supporting plug and play, this cordless keyboard and mouse combo is widely compatible with Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10/11, Mac ( Please note that the independent hot-keys may not be available in Mac system ). >> Windows/Mac OS Dual System & 2.4G Stable Wireless Connection This wireless keyboard and mouse is equipped with Windows/Mac OS dual systems, promoting a wider range of applications. the same USB receiver, no need to take up additional USB ports (Also the wireless keyboard and mouse can also be used separately). Plug & play, no need to download any software, 2.4 GHz wireless provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 33 feet(10m) without any delays. >> How does the Power Indicator Work ? After the new battery is put into the keyboard and mouse: a. If the connection goes normally with the computer, the power red indicator will flash 5-8 seconds and then off, the computer will working normally.b. If the computer is not normally connected with the keyboard, the power red indicator lights on for a long while to indicate you and then off.c. When on Low battery mode ,the Power Red Indicator will flash when you press any key . (So when you first start using, the power red indicator keeps flashing for 5-8 seconds is normal.)

Perfect for Both Day and Night, Enjoy your working when at Home/Office/Library/Gaming Room Important Instructions For Trouble Shooting You may Need to Know >> The Keyboard/Mouse Response Is Delayed and Works Abnormally, How to Solve It? 1. The battery may be low, please recharge the battery for the keyboard/mouse. 2. It may be caused by the computer being stuck, please restart the computer and try again. 3. The maximum use distance of this product is 33ft, please keep it within 33ft. 4. And be sure there are no metal obstacles between the keyboard/mouse and the receiver. >> Tips: Solution to Connection Exception Keyboard 1. Make sure the battery is fully charged and replug the receiver into the computer. 2. Turn off and on the keyboard switch, which should be within 20cm away from the receiver. 3. Press and hold the keyboard “ESC” + “K” keys together to pair again. Mouse 1. Make sure the battery is fully charged and replug the receiver into the computer. 2. Turn off and on the mouse switch, which should be within 20cm away from the receiver. 3. Press and hold the Right button and Scroll button together to pair again. Note:If the solution doesn’t help, repeat the steps to pair again. If still fail, please contact our service team.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS SET!! 2 month update
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great value for my money. At first I was worried the keys were to close together but it’s actually perfect. The keys are soft and very quiet to type with. There are 3 brightness settings. I work from home and the first 2 hours the sun is still down and I’d prefer not to turn the light on that early so I bought this keyboard for the backlight. It’s very pleasing to the eyes and the mouse that comes with it is smooth and quiet clicks as well. I enjoy the design of this keyboard it’s not super basic and it’s a very sturdy hardware.UPDATEI’ve had this set for 2 months and I still love it very much. I love the key strokes and the colors and feel of this set just so much. However the keys are starting to wipe away which takes away from the look of the keyboard and makes it look worn out. This keyboard has such a great look to it that it’s very saddening that the keys are wiping away so easily. Almost as if it was constructed cheaply. I rarely use the N key as I don’t have any passwords or commonly used words in my job that require the letter N. My R, D, C, and O keys are also starting to fade away. This is the biggest downfall I have experienced with this set which is a pretty hard fall. The battery last a very long time and I only have to charge it maybe every week and half. Nothing earlier or sooner than that. It is a great value for your money but by the way the keys are disappearing I won’t have this set for very long. Highly disappointed in this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a keyboard and mouse combo.
reviews.reviewText: It's a keyboard, and a mouse, they work together, they have RGB lighting, they're rechargeable, and quiet, uses a single usb dongle for both, connects instantly. Comes in a box that your cat will enjoy, and after all....isn't that all that really matters?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great buy until the 'Alt' and 'Enter' key didn't work
reviews.reviewText: A great buy until the 'Alt' and 'Enter' key didn't work after using it for only 2 months. 😒 I love the look, quality, and the way the keys are silent when I type.I was very disappointed to notice that in the last few days, the keyboard doesn't register the above key sequence. Now the S key is not working and I've only had this for 2 months!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is so comfortable to use! I love the way the keys feel on my fingers when I'm using it! Plus, I love the way the keyboard and the mouse light up in multi-colors. It's just one of the best keyboards I've purchased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want to love this keyoboard
reviews.reviewText: The mouse and keyboard wireless set is functional and very pretty. I have no complaints whatsoever about the mouse. However, I haven't had the keyboard three months yet and the letters are blurry and disappearing on the actual keyboard. It also at random times start typing a bunch of plus signs (+). I try turning it off and back on or charging it doesn't fix the problem. Just as randomly as it starts, it stops. I use the keyboard for work so it's a big inconvenience***UPDATED REVIEW 12/22***** reached out the seller who addressed my issue promptly and replaced my keyboard/mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for daily use in my classroom. I love that it lights up, and it keeps a good charge, both the keyboard and the mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stop looking. You have found it.
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this keyboard/mouse combo. It is quiet, beautiful, and I have only had to charge to mouse once (keyboard not at all, yet.) Just get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great keyboard and mouse
reviews.reviewText: But this a few months ago and I’m very happy with the overall performance and quality of both the mouse and keyboard. The colors on the display had a little smile as well.
